players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Charlie with a suspicious bag last night. I think he might be the mafioso."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso. Alice, could you elaborate on why you think Charlie had a suspicious bag?"
Bob: "Bob is the mafioso, and I have evidence. Charlie had a suspicious bag because he was meeting with someone who could be connected to the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
